item.description:
At our October meetup, Marilou Seavey, Master Trainer of NLP (www.mindbridgetraining.com) set the framework of turbo-charging the Law Of Attraction with NLP.

During our November meetup, Tom Maloney, BostonLOA member & Essential Mind Power Trainer, will facilitate a more in-depth discussion of how we can use an NLP-based questionnaire powerfully to springboard us to develop a more well-formed outcome.

A well-formed outcome allows you to ...
** align your core beliefs with your true desires,
** propel towards manifesting what you really want

Join us, plan on being actively engaged in learning and using the questionnaire & other NLP-related exercises.

Thank you very much, Tom, for your gift of time and facilitation at our November meetup!


About Tom Maloney:

Tom has been actively pursuing the study of the power of the mind since 1973 when he took his first Silva Mind Power class. He is a Master NLP Practitioner, NLP Coach and Essential Mind Power Trainer.

to contact Tom: TAAM2@aol.com

NLP (Neuro Linguistic Programming) is the science of studying success, & then "reprogramming" the software of your mind to produce immediate & positive change in all areas of your life.

Combining the thinking of LOA with NLP skills offers you powerful & practical tools available for changing limiting beliefs, behaviors, & for achieving rapid results in your personal, professional & spiritual development.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: AGENDA for BostonLOA November 6th Meetup
